ingredients.ingredient: 2 large plantains, peeled and broken into chunks
1 tablespoon olive oil, or more to taste

cookingTips: Use slightly underripe plantains to avoid excessive sweetness
Process plantains until very smooth for better bread texture
Bake at 375Â°F for 35-40 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean
